titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at the funeral of Alexander Fraiser of Doores, Knight and baronet, principal physician to the King of Great Britain &c. who died at Whitehall, April 28, 1681, in the seventieth and fifth year of his age, and was solemnly interr'd amongst his ancestors at Doores the 28 of July following / by John Menzies.
titleStmt.author: Menzeis, John, 1624-1684.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
